name: Black Hole Trash
description:
A quick game I made to learn Godot. I mostly used Kenney assets and some gradient stuff I made for the New Game/Game Over screens.

The game is a simple space shooter where you have to suck in the debris from the ships you destroy to gather more ammo. As you pick up more and more debris enemy ships start going faster.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Vacuum debris
